-spec find_missing_and_repeated_values(Grid :: [[integer()]]) -> [integer()].
find_missing_and_repeated_values(Grid) ->
    N = length(Grid),
    MaxVal = N * N,
    ExpectedSum = (MaxVal * (MaxVal + 1)) div 2,
    FlattenedGrid = lists:flatten(Grid),
    {ActualSum, CountMap} = lists:foldl(fun(X, {Sum, Map}) ->
        {Sum + X, maps:update_with(X, fun(Val) -> Val + 1 end, 1, Map)}
    end, {0, maps:new()}, FlattenedGrid),
    Missing = ExpectedSum - ActualSum,
    Repeated = find_repeated(CountMap),
    [Repeated, Missing + Repeated].

find_repeated(CountMap) ->
    maps:fold(fun(Key, Val, Res) ->
        if
            Val == 2 -> Key;
            true -> Res
        end
    end, undefined, CountMap).
